QuestData.Title: Lupus Pupus
QuestData.Description: Whatever you do, don't eat this bait yourself. Just set it down in the vicinity of an oil-soaked wolf. If they're desperate enough to eat the microfilm, they'll come running when they smell the bait.$B$BSimply wait for nature to take its course and then all you need to do is search the, uh... byproduct for the film.$B$BI'd offer you my special lupus pupus scupus for the job, but I left it back at the airstrip. I'm afraid you'll have to conduct the... err... search the old-fashioned way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Iggy "Tailspin" Cogtoggle in the Scalding Pools wants you to bring him 8 pieces of Microfilm.
QuestData.RewardText: <Iggy holds his nose as he accepts the microfilm from you.>$B$BYuck, well, we've complied with section 8.2, paragraph B of the emergency protocol here and recovered the film. Nothing in the protocol says I'm responsible for cleaning it, though.
